string.name: food_description
string.value: 1 medium apple with 2 tablespoons peanut butter

parameters.query:
=INSERT INTO meal_items (
  meal_id,
  custom_food_name,
  quantity,
  unit,
  calories,
  protein,
  carbs,
  fat,
  fiber,
  sugar,
  sodium
) VALUES (
  gen_random_uuid(),
  '{{ $json.food_description }}',
  1,
  '{{ $json.serving_size }}',
  {{ $json.calories }},
  {{ $json.protein }},
  {{ $json.carbs }},
  {{ $json.fat }},
  {{ $json.fiber }},
  {{ $json.sugar }},
  {{ $json.sodium }}
) RETURNING *;
